actions.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 340 - 84 (Roll no. 443).
Mr. Collins demanded a separate vote on the Hyde amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides that any defendant who prevails in a federal prosecution will have an opportunity to recover attorney's fees and costs when a court finds that the government was not substantially justified in initiating the case.
purpose: An amendment to reimburse defendants for legal expenses incurred as a result of a Justice Department prosecution that is found to be not substantially justified.
